","usphone":"tred","phrases":"foreign trade: 外贸，对外贸易
international trade: 国际贸易
world trade: 世界贸易
trade in: 买卖；抵价购物
trade something for something: 用某物换某物，用某货换某货
free trade: [经]自由贸易
export trade: 出口贸易；出口商
world trade organization: 世界贸易组织（产生于关贸总协定的乌拉圭谈判， 其目的是为促进多边贸易谈判和协议而成立的。）
trade with: 从事贸易；和…做贸易；与…做生意
trade center: 贸易中心
trade union: 工会
processing trade: 加工贸易；委托加工贸易
carrying trade: 海外贸易，转口贸易
trade mark: 商标；特征
trade policy: 贸易政策
service trade: 服务业；劳务贸易
trade surplus: 贸易顺差；贸易盈余
trade fair: 商品交易会；贸易展销会
trade off: 权衡；卖掉；交替使用；交替换位
trade for: 以…换得；贸易交换
","sentences":"They had to travel into town to trade the produce from their farm.
^^他们不得不到镇上去出售他们农场的产品。^^
We traded necklaces.
^^我们交换了项链。^^
","relWords":"adj.
trading: 交易的；贸易的

n.
trading: 交易；贸易；购物
trader: 交易者；商人；商船

v.
trading: 交换（trade的ing形式）；做买卖

","synos":"n.
贸易，[贸易]交易；[劳经]行业；职业：commerce, profession, employment, career, pursuit
vi.
[贸易]交易，买卖；以物易物：traffic, exchange, truck
","realExamSentences":"...Citizens gathered to view and trade precious artworks...
^^2017.6 CET6 第一套 文本题^^
...its trade group offered to provide standardized forms for automated processing...
^^2016.6 CET6 第二套 阅读理解^^
...Take your average trade union member...
^^2015.12 CET6 第三套 阅读理解^^
...and obviously trade unions are one of the biggest civil society networks in the UK...
^^2015.12 CET6 第三套 阅读理解^^
...a two-year environmental campaign aimed at trade unionists...
^^2015.12 CET6 第三套 阅读理解^^
...brings down the trade deficit...
^^2013.6 CET6 第一套 阅读理解^^
...and institutions that control the trade in oil exercise extraordinary power...
^^2013.6 CET6 第二套 阅读理解^^
...The trade on the Silk Road has played an important role in the development of the civilizations of China...
^^2013.12 CET6 第三套 文本题^^
...The larger the trade deficit...
^^2011.12 CET6 undefined 阅读理解^^
...When the Commerce Department reported last week that the trade deficit in June approached $50 billion...
^^2011.12 CET6 undefined 阅读理解^^
"},"$:/CET6_2/abide_10":{"title":"$:/CET6_2/abide_10","word":"abide","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-CET6_2/Word}}","created":"20220414154941824","transCn":"v. 忍受；遵守

","usphone":"ɪk'splɪsɪt","remMethod":"ex(出) ＋ pli(重) ＋ cit → 重复地说出 → 详述的，明确的","phrases":"explicit expression: 显式表达式

explicit formulation: 显式
","sentences":"The contrast could not have been made more explicit.
^^这个对比再清楚不过了。^^
explicit knowledge of grammar
^^清楚易懂的语法知识^^
The kidnappers gave us explicit instructions not to involve the police.
^^绑匪明确告诉我们不许报警。^^
Be explicit when you talk about money with your family.
^^与家人谈钱的问题要直截了当。^^
","relWords":"adv.
explicitly: 明确地；明白地

n.
explicitness: 直言不讳；明确性

","synos":"adj.
明确的；清楚的；直率的；详述的：precise, decided, distinct, specific, express
","realExamSentences":"...The aim is to ensure that employees have an explicit tool to help them understand their own abilities and aspirations...
^^2013.12 CET6 第二套 阅读理解^^
...The United States does have one explicit family policy...
^^2010.6 CET6 undefined 阅读理解^^
